turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can i help u today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where did u wanna order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I always go to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what did u want from bella luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Any two small pizzas on pepperoni, olives, onions, and green peppers and one meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me read that back to u to make sure i got everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small pizzas, 1 with pepperoni, olives, green peppers, and 1 meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. the total for the order is $25.24. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the pizza's also need to be on a gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me change that in your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i've changed your order so it is as follows. 2 small pizzas, 1 with pepperoni, olives, green peppers, and 1 meat lovers, both with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: does that sound good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add onions to the first pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small pizzas, 1 with pepperoni, olives, green peppers and onions, and 1 meat lovers, both with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll b ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u need anything else ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, good bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See you.
